1. DFID supports CSOs through centrally managed funds like the Civil Society Challenge Fund, Programme Partnership Agreements and the Governance Transparency Fund.
2. The Governance Transparency Fund supports CSOs in the UK and in developing countries. Only the funding to UK CSOs are shown in this table. The total value of the GTF in 2009/10 was £26.8 million
